title: The Draymond Green Show - Suns/Warriors breakdown, Klay's comeback, and an Andre Iguodala Interview
itunes:title: The Draymond Green Show - Suns/Warriors breakdown, Klay's comeback, and an Andre Iguodala Interview
description:
In the third episode of ‘The Draymond Green Show’ Dray details the Warriors 104-96 loss to the Suns, what he’s most excited about for Klay Thompson’s return, and Boogie Cousins signing with the Milwaukee Bucks before welcoming Andre Iguodala to discuss their time playing together as well as Andre’s venture capitalist experience. Finally, Dray shares his thoughts on Virgil Abloh’s tragic passing. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
